original_title: McDonald’s is cutting prices of its combo meals to convince customers it’s affordable again | CNN Business
article_summary: McDonald's to Lower Combo Meal Prices by 15%: McDonald's is reducing the prices of eight popular combo meals by 15%, following public criticism over the chain's perceived increase in prices. The move comes after the CEO acknowledged the menu had become too expensive and pledged to address the issue. The lower prices will take effect next month, with additional value meal offerings, such as a $5 breakfast deal and an $8 Big Mac and McNugget special, planned for the near future.</s>
